main.subtitle: What We Can Do for You
main.title: The companies that changed the world all start with a visionary
main.description: We offer comprehensive one-stop solutions for foreign companies investing in Indonesia, facilitating market entry, regulatory approvals, labor sourcing, and more.

initial.title: Initial Consultation
initial.description: Understand client needs and project scope for tailored solutions.

supplier.title: Supplier and Labor Sourcing
supplier.description: Identify reliable suppliers and skilled labor to support project demands.

market.title: Market Entry Strategy
market.description: Develop strategies for seamless market entry into Indonesia.

project.title: Project Execution
project.description: Efficiently assemble smartphones, electric bicycles, and accessories according to specifications.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.description: Navigate regulatory requirements to ensure legal compliance and smooth operations.

ongoing.title: Ongoing Support
ongoing.description: Provide continuous support to maintain operational efficiency and sustain business growth.
